hero.description: Strategic SEO consulting that turns organic traffic into measurable growth. English and Spanish markets with data-driven strategies.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: SEO strategies that drive results.
services.subtitle: No scattered tactics. Just 2–3 high-impact strategies executed with precision for measurable growth.

items.title: Technical SEO Audits
items.desc: Deep site analysis identifying critical fixes. Crawlability, Core Web Vitals, structured data, and indexation.

items.title: Strategic Link Building
items.desc: Quality over quantity. High-authority placements on relevant sites that build real authority and referral traffic.

items.title: Content Strategy
items.desc: Bottom-of-funnel landing pages and content that captures high-intent searches and converts visitors into customers.

items.title: Bilingual SEO
items.desc: Native optimization for English and Spanish markets. Hreflang, localized keyword research, and regional strategies.

results.label: Results
results.title: Numbers that speak louder than words.

process.label: How We Work
process.title: From audit to growth in four steps.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.desc: Deep analysis of your business, competitors, and market opportunities.

steps.title: Execution
steps.desc: Hands-on implementation with detailed instructions and ongoing support.

steps.title: Growth
steps.desc: Monthly reports, optimization, and scaling what works.

contact.label: Get Started
contact.title: Ready to dominate your market?
contact.subtitle: Book a free 30-minute strategy call. We'll analyze your current SEO and show you exactly where the opportunities are.
contact.name: Name
contact.message: Tell us about your business and SEO goals...

footer.desc: Strategic SEO consulting for businesses ready to dominate their market. Bilingual expertise.
